column4: in the latest gutsy (been using beta, and i think there was a kernel upgrade a couple days ago), i mapped my keyboards sleep button to lock the screen. this worked up until this last kernel. now it locks the screen and then hibernates or shuts down my computer. how can i get it to just lock the screen only again?
lol gutsy isnt stable yet. its labeled stable but it still has issues
if you're having problems, file a bug report.
fiesty was way more stable and reliable then gutsy has been for me
